name: CrashApe Wowie Jam 3.0
description:
Controlls: WASD
Roll: Space
Attack: Left Mouse
Block: Right Mouse

After each boss you can choose your drop (what YOU will drop)

Game was made for Wowie Jam 3.0 Theme "FAILURE IS PROGRESS/Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing." Didn't manage to finish all my ideas. I planed to have a small dungeon and at the end there is a boss. Also i planned to add 3 different types of bosses.
